meanings.definition: The state or quality of being careful.
meanings.sent1: Her carefullnesses in handling delicate items impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: His carefullnesses in crossing the street ensured his safety.
meanings.sent3: The carefullnesses of the squirrel in gathering nuts was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The carefullnesses of a detective in solving a case is like a spider weaving its web.
meanings.sent5: The carefullnesses of a surgeon during an operation can make all the difference.

meanings.definition: The act of being cautious or attentive.
meanings.sent1: The carefullnesses of the lifeguard saved the drowning swimmer.
meanings.sent2: She showed great carefullnesses when handling the fragile vase.
meanings.sent3: The carefullnesses of a cat stalking its prey can be quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The carefullnesses of a chess player planning their moves is like a master strategist.
meanings.sent5: The carefullnesses of a teacher watching over her students is heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The attention to detail or thoroughness in performing a task.
meanings.sent1: His carefullnesses in painting every corner of the room was evident in the final result.
meanings.sent2: The carefullnesses of the chef in plating the dish made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent3: The carefullnesses of a child trying to tie their shoelaces can be quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The carefullnesses of a writer in choosing the right words is like a painter with their palette.
meanings.sent5: The carefullnesses of an architect in designing a building can define its beauty.
